All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, java.util.Collection<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, java.util.List<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class GLTransformationList
extends java.util.ArrayList<java.nio.FloatBuffer>

Qualified class for list of transformations. Used for Biological Unit or Non-Crystallographic transforms Contains a list of niobuffer representations created from the supplied ModelTransformationList matrices in the constructor. This keeps ModelTransformationMatrix clean of any nio or gl dependencies.

Author:
rickb
See Also:
org.rcsb.mbt.model.geometry.ModelTranformationMatrix, ModelTransformationList, Serialized Form
